Combine P-Values Using Various Methods

poolPValues.Rd

Pools p-values using one of several methods: Fisher's Method, Stouffer's Method, Weighted Z-test, or Cauchy Combination Test. Caps pooled p-values at a minimum threshold.

Usage

poolPValues(pvallist, method = "fisher", weights = NULL, min_pval = 1e-09)

Arguments

pvallist

A numeric vector of p-values.

method

The method to use for combining p-values. Options are "fisher", "stouffer", "weighted_z", and "cauchy".

weights

A numeric vector of weights for the Weighted Z-test. Defaults to equal weights.

min_pval

The minimum threshold for pooled p-values. Defaults to 1e-9.

Value

A numeric value representing the combined p-value.
